lines: 1. 'Buya mbore nkak'obwachani boreo,'Mogok'oigwekek'obwanchani bore nka;'Morembe n'omoigoto,N'omogoko bibeo,Ng'aki ere buyak'obwanchani bore nka.
'Bwanchani, bore nka,Ng'aki ere buyak'obwanchani bore nka.
2. 'Mogoko nyombak'obwanchani boreo,Moko tegocha,k'obwanchani bore nka;Bisicha biam'as'ense,As'emegond'emiya,Bogima bwagokigwa,'Bwanchani nyomba.
3. lgor'egoka k'obwanchanibore nka,Ens'eichorw'obwanchaniko bore nyomba;Agansoko gatera,Igoro ner'eraba,k'obwanchani bore nka,Yes'agokigwa.
4. Yeso nkore mb'oyoobwanchani boche,Nsang'ekeng'wanso kiao,'Rio twanchane nka;Ntimoke korw'obobe, Tindengereri 'ebibe,'S'obuya nseseneke,Bwanchani nyomba.
